alert.note: Alert for Black Hawk; Bremer; Grundy; Jasper; Marshall; Poweshiek; Tama (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 11:09PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Poweshiek, eastern Marshall, Black Hawk, Tama, southern Bremer, Grundy and northeastern Jasper Counties through MIDNIGHT CDT... At 1109 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Dike to Rock Creek Lake. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Uni-Dome And McLeod Center around 1115 PM CDT. Cedar Falls, Hudson and Waterloo Municipal Airport around 1120 PM CDT. Crossroads Mall around 1125 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Waterloo, Evansdale, Elk Run Heights, Brooklyn, Jesup and Victor. This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 between mile markers 163 and 204. Interstate 380 between mile markers 56 and 73. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CDT for central, north central and northeastern Iowa.

area.areaDesc: Black Hawk; Bremer; Grundy; Jasper; Marshall; Poweshiek; Tama
